# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. We believe it could significantly enhance your experience or contribute valuablely to your collection. Considering its worth, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at this special price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
